Ein klasse Puzzle-Game mit teilweise fordernden Rätseln in den Bereichen: Reaktionsgeschwindigkeit, Timing, Logik, Schalter, Deckung usw. Das Spiel verpackt auf charmante Weise eine witzige und dezente Storyline und hey, am Ende gibt es auch noch einen Kuchen dafür!
Langeweile kommt hier auch nicht so schnell auf, trotz fehlen von anderen "Figuren" zum interagieren.

Für jeden Menschen der Puzzle/Rätzel Games mag ein absoluter Pflichtkauf, und eine klare Empfehlung.

★★★★

7.6/10. Very short and not terribly difficult, but the bonus challenges made up for it a little. I had a lot of fun with it though, learning more and more each time I played, especially the achievements for cameras and radios. I like that they're a reward for thoroughly playing through the game, which is actually more bearable than I'd think given that Portal is so short. Chambers have more than one way to get through a lot of the time, which was fun to discover naturally. GLaDOS brought all of the personality to Portal, it really wouldn't be half as fun without her.

Grab this review template here! 👉 https://vojtastruhar.github.io/steam-review-template/

Технодемка которая выстрелила. Так можно описать первый Portal.
По сути отсутствие лора, какой либо впечатляющей графики, но есть геймплей который вполне это компенсирует, хоть игра и не очень длинная. Даже спустя все эти годы, если вы не играли то с первым Portal'ом стоит познакомиться.

Portal is truly something worthy of all the praise. So simple, yet filled with complexity at its core. It's like adding the perfect amount of sugar to a cup of coffee.

You can say it's kinda like a... [i]cake[/i] with how complex it is.

i just finished the game and the ending was phenomenal
highly recommend buying the game even if its 14 years old
神作无需多言
I'm not sure if I could look at my toaster the same way after playing this game.

The cake was a lie, but the reputation of this game is not. Novel yet simple game mechanic, with puzzles that are challenging enough without being frustrating, and some dark humour that makes for a really fun game.
